Citation

Zizka A, Silvestro D, Andermann T, Azevedo J, Duarte Ritter C, Edler D, Farooq H, Herdean A, Ariza M, Scharn R, Svanteson S, Wengstrom N, Zizka V, Antonelli A (2019). “CoordinateCleaner: standardized cleaning of occurrence records from biological collection databases.” Methods in Ecology and Evolution, 0. doi: 10.1111/2041-210X.13152, R package version 2.0-8, https://github.com/ropensci/CoordinateCleaner.
